<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108509</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108509</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats: history and literature on trial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate: Geschichte 
und Literatur auf Versuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion : histoire
et littérature sur l'épreuve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão: history
e literatura na experimentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione: storia e
letteratura sulla prova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης: ιστορία και 
βιβλιογραφία στη δοκιμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión: 
historia y literatura en ensayo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Putting historical or literary figures on trial makes a lively and challenging alternative to a class debate.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Setzen der historischen oder literarischen 
Abbildungen auf Versuch bildet eine lebhafte und schwierige 
Alternative zu einer Kategorie Debatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mise des figures historiques ou littéraires 
sur l'épreuve fait une alternative animée et provocante à une 
discussion de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pôr figuras históricas ou literárias na 
experimentação faz uma alternativa vívida e challenging a um debate
da classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mettere le figure storiche o letterarie sulla 
prova fa un'alternativa vivace e challenging ad un dibattito del 
codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τοποθέτηση των ιστορικών ή λογοτεχνικών αριθμών στη
δοκιμή κάνει μια ζωηρή και προκλητική εναλλακτική λύση σε μια 
συζήτηση κλάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poner figuras históricas o literarias en ensayo 
hace un alternativa animado y desafiador a un discusión de la clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHRYN WALBERT
FN:KATHRYN WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108509</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/alternative-discussion-formats-history-and-literature-on-trial</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
